title: Publicize to Facebook
instructions:
1. Ensure that you have a connected Facebook account
2. Publish a new post (with an image)
3. Ensure that the post was published to your Facebook feed

title: Publicize to Twitter
instructions:
1. Ensure that you have a connected Twitter account
2. Publish a new post
3. Ensure that the post was published to your Twitter account

title: Publish a full post
instructions:
1. Go to Posts > Add New in your dashboard.
2. Write a long post, with text and images
3. Hit Publish.
4. The post should be sent to all Jetpack subscribers for that site.

title: Subscriptions: Schedule a post
instructions:
1. Go to Posts > Add New in your dashboard.
2. Write a long post, with text and images.
3. Schedule the post to be published later.
4. When the post gets published, it should be sent to all Jetpack subscribers for that site.

title: Publish a post including a Read More tag
instructions:
1. Go to Posts > Add New in your dashboard.
2. Write a long post, with text and images.
3. Add a Read More tag in the middle of your post.
4. Hit Publish.
5. The post should be sent to all Jetpack subscribers for that site, and should only include the content above the Read more tag.

title: Publish a post with feed settings set to Full
instructions:
0. In Settings > Reading, set your Feed settings to Full.
1. Go to Posts > Add New in your dashboard.
2. Write a long post, with text and images.
3. Hit Publish.
4. The post should be sent to all Jetpack subscribers for that site. The whole post content should be sent to subscribers.

title: Publish a post with feed settings set to Excerpt
instructions:
0. In Settings > Reading, set your Feed settings to Summary.
1. Go to Posts > Add New in your dashboard.
2. Write a long post, with text and images.
3. Hit Publish.
4. The post should be sent to all Jetpack subscribers for that site. Only an automated excerpt should be sent to subscribers.

title: Publish a post with feed settings set to Excerpt
instructions:
0. In Settings > Reading, set your Feed settings to Summary.
1. Go to Posts > Add New in your dashboard.
2. Write a long post, with text and images.
3. Create a custom excerpt in the excerpt box below the visual editor.
4. Hit Publish.
5. The post should be sent to all Jetpack subscribers for that site. Only the custom excerpt should be sent to subscribers.

title: Publish a post while using the jetpack_allow_per_post_subscriptions filter
instructions:
0. Follow the instructions here to add the jetpack_allow_per_post_subscriptions filter to your site:
https://developer.jetpack.com/hooks/jetpack_allow_per_post_subscriptions/
1. Go to Posts > Add New in your dashboard.
2. Write a long post, with text and images.
3. Select the checkbox to send the email to subscribers.
4. Hit Publish.
5. The post should be sent to all Jetpack subscribers for that site.

title: Publish a post while using the jetpack_subscriptions_exclude_these_categories filter
instructions:
0. Follow the instructions here to add the jetpack_subscriptions_exclude_these_categories filter to your site:
https://developer.jetpack.com/hooks/jetpack_subscriptions_exclude_these_categories/
1. Go to Posts > Add New in your dashboard.
2. Write a long post, with text and images.
3. Select a category that should be excluded from Subscriptions
4. Hit Publish.
5. The post should not be sent to the Jetpack subscribers since it belongs to an excluded category.

title: Publish a post while using the jetpack_subscriptions_exclude_all_categories_except filter
instructions:
0. Follow the instructions here to add the jetpack_subscriptions_exclude_all_categories_except filter to your site:
https://developer.jetpack.com/hooks/jetpack_subscriptions_exclude_all_categories_except/
1. Go to Posts > Add New in your dashboard.
2. Write a long post, with text and images.
3. Select a category that should be included in Subscriptions.
4. Hit Publish.
5. The post should be sent to the Jetpack subscribers since it belongs to an allowed category.

title: Publish a post via the WordPress.com Post Editor
instructions:
1. Go to http://wordpress.com/post/
2. Write a long post, with text and images.
3. Hit Publish.
4. The post should be sent to the Jetpack subscribers.

title: Schedule a post via the WordPress.com Post Editor
instructions:
1. Go to http://wordpress.com/post/
2. Write a long post, with text and images.
3. Schedule the post to be published later.
4. When the post gets published, it should be sent to the Jetpack subscribers.

title: Publish a post via a third party app using the JSON API
instructions:
1. Go to https://stackedit.io/editor
2. Write a long post, with text and images.
3. Click on # > Publish > WordPress
4. Follow the instructions to connect StackEdit to your site.
5. Use the button in the top right corner to publish your post.
6. The post should be sent to the Jetpack subscribers.

title: Publish a post via the bulk editing tools in your Posts list.
instructions:
1. Go to Posts > Add New
2. Write a long post, with text and images.
3. Save your draft.
4. Go to the Posts screen
5. Select your post, click on Edit, and publish it without entering the post editing screen.
6. The post should be sent to the Jetpack subscribers.

title: Edit multiple post via the bulk editing tools in your Posts list.
instructions:
1. Go to the Posts screen
2. Select several posts that were already published, click on Edit, and make some changes (change the publication date, add tags, ...).
3. Save your changes.
4. The posts should not be sent to the Jetpack subscribers.

title: Import posts via the WordPress Importer.
instructions:
1. Go to Tools > Import
2. Import several posts from another WordPress site. You can use this import file as an example:
https://wpcom-themes.svn.automattic.com/demo/theme-unit-test-data.xml
3. Run the import
4. The posts should not be sent to the Jetpack subscribers.

title: Publicize to LinkedIn
instructions:
1. Ensure that you have a connected LinkedIn account
2. Publish a new post (with an image)
3. Ensure that the post was published to your LinkedIn feed

title: Publicize to Google+
instructions:
1. Ensure that you have a connected Google+ account
2. Publish a new post (with an image)
3. Ensure that the post was published to your Google+ feed

title: Publicize to Tumblr
instructions:
1. Ensure that you have a connected Tumblr account
2. Publish a new post (with an image)
3. Ensure that the post was published to your Tumblr feed

title: Publicize to Path
instructions:
1. Ensure that you have a connected Path account
2. Publish a new post (with an image)
3. Ensure that the post was published to your Path feed
